visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the following specifications: Chart type: spline, Chart title: Monthly Average Temperature, Axes and labels styling: Use a dark blue color for the title and labels, with a font size of 14px for the title and 12px for the labels, Data series: Provide data for a single series named 'Temperature' with monthly average temperature values, Custom colors: Use a gradient from light blue to dark blue for the series, Additional configurations: Set the chart background to a light gray color, add a legend with the series name, and set the chart margins to 50 pixels on all sides.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a spline chart titled 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart type is set to 'spline', and the background color is a light gray (#f0f0f0). The chart margins are set to 50 pixels on all sides to provide adequate spacing. The title and axis labels are styled with a dark blue color (#00008B) and specific font sizes: 14px for the title and 12px for the labels. The x-axis categories represent the months of the year, while the y-axis is labeled as 'Temperature (°C)'. The data series, named 'Temperature', includes monthly average temperature values. The series color is a gradient from light blue (#ADD8E6) to dark blue (#00008B). Additionally, a legend is enabled to display the series name.
